import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Tooltip from '@material-ui/core/Tooltip'; import validation from '../Utility/validations' import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import '../CssFiles/SignUp.css' class SignUp extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state ={ userName:"", userNameError:" error part", password:"", passwordError:"password error", cnf_Pass:"", cnf_PassError:"cnf pass", mobile_no:"", mobile_no_Error:"mobile number", email:"", emailError:"" } } render() { return (
Sign up with your permanent account details
Edumetrix Empowerment Foundation
Already have an account? Sign in!
) } } export default SignUp
